title: What Is Web3?
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: One way to think about blockchain technology is as part of an important evolution of the internet, a phase some people call Web3.

title: Forbes Blockchain 50 2023
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Despite 2022’s crypto market collapse, dozens of enterprises around the world are still investing in blockchain, the distributed-database technology that underpins the entire sector because it helps their businesses operate better, faster or cheaper.

title: Ethereum May Be Killing The ‘Ethereum Killers’ Thanks To Layer 2 Solutions
author: Kenneth Rapoza
description: Is Coinbase’s entry into the Layer 2 solutions market one more chip in the armor of blockchains like Solana that were built to compete with Ethereum?

title: Remember Neopets? This Hong Kong Company Is Trying To Revitalize The Nostalgic Game With Web3 Technology
author: Zinnia Lee
description: The heyday of Neopets has long gone. But Dominic Law, CEO of Neopets Meta, thinks the two decades-old virtual pet game has all the right ingredients to become a Web3 title.

title: Crypto CEO Says That Competing With Ethereum Is A Bad Idea
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: New crypto platforms are emerging with the goal of helping sluggish Ethereum scale instead of trying to siphon users. But they come with their own set of tradeoffs.

title: BlackRock’s Newest Investment Paves The Way For Digital Assets On Wall Street
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: According to today's earnings call, beyond cryptocurrencies and stablecoins, BlackRock is also studying tokenization and permissioned blockchains

title: Fintech 50 2022: The Newcomers
author: Jeff Kauflin
description: For our seventh annual Fintech 50, 25 of our picks have never appeared on the list. Crypto companies and startups trying to make banking cheaper and more accessible for small businesses made a particularly strong showing.

title: KKR Blockchain Access To $4 Billion Fund Opens Door To Crypto Investors
author: Michael del Castillo
description: Fractionalized investments bring financial providers to the scene as regulators struggle with noncompliant crypto companies.

title: Crypto Investing—A New Investor's Guide
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Crypto investing is much more than just buying bitcoin. There are a range of options depending on your risk appetite. This guide will help you get started.

title: How To Stake Your Crypto
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Node operators are paid in a blockchain’s native currency–ether on the Ethereum network for example–each time new data is added.

title: How Mastercard, Goldman Sachs And Other “TradFi” Titans Are Using Blockchain To Rewire Global Finance
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Crypto is in crisis, but many of the world’s biggest financial institutions are still banking on the underlying tech as the best way to build confidence with customers—and with one another.

title: What Is Crypto?
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Crypto is a general term for the vast blockchain protocol ecosystem. Learn about what crypto is, and the various industries that are housed under its umbrella.

title: What Japan Could Teach The U.S.—And The World—About Regulating Crypto
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: After the MtGox hack, Tokyo put in place tough rules that later protected FTX customers. Now, from that secure base, it’s moving to allow blockchain technologies to flourish.

title: Crypto CEO - The Traditional Way Of Moving Assets Across Blockchains Is A ‘Horrible Construct’
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: LayerZero Labs CEO Bryan Pellegrino says that the current bridges used to transfer assets between networks are rife with security risks. His firm's solutions look to make it much safer to move everything from money to data.

title: Emin Gun Sirer, Founder Of The Avalanche Blockchain, Is Not Sweating A 76% Drop In Token Price
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Emin Gun Sirer, a founder of the Avalanche blockchain, a top challenger to Ethereum, the world’s largest multi-purpose decentralized computing platform is taking the recent the trillion-dollar crypto crash in stride. He also explains why blockchains have become the new venture capitalists.

title: What Blur’s Success Reveals About NFT Marketplaces
author: Callan Quinn
description: The race to become the top NFT marketplace is far from over, especially as creators fight back against the rise of optional royalties.

title: Web3 Growth Stymied By Scarcity Of Programmers
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Developer shortage stands in the way of decentralized, blockchain-centric internet bliss.

title: The Future Of Crypto And Blockchain: Fintech 50 2022
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: A record nine cryptocurrency-focused companies made it onto the Forbes Fintech 50 list this year. Collectively, the trailblazers have raised $6.5 billion in venture capital funding.

title: Despite Fears Of Huge Supply Unlock, Ethereum’s New Upgrade Propels It To New Highs
author: Leeor Shimron
description: Ethereum is finally allowing its stakers to withdrawal $35 billion in tokens from the network. However, more tokens are rushing in than pulling out.

title: Web3 - A Transformative And Disruptive Multi-Trillion-Dollar Opportunity To Service Billions
author: Roomy Khan
description: Web3 sector will grow at a roughly 50 percent compound annual growth rate (CAGR) to become a multi-trillion-dollar industry over the next decade. Web3 could go from a buzzword to mainstream, disrupting existing businesses while creating massive new markets.

title: Bankruptcy And Crypto
author: Nizan Geslevich Packin
description: We’re about to find out the hard way just how protected crypto investors are in the event of collapse of crypto firms, as crypto is being put on trial in bankruptcy courts for the first time.

title: Coinbase NFT Partner 0x Labs Raises $70 Million From Greylock Partners, Jump Crypto, and Jared Leto
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Following the successful integration with Coinbase’s newly launched NFT marketplace, the San-Francisco-based startup plans to dabble further into the NFT tech and decentralized finance.

title: FTX’s Implosion Is Crushing The Solana NFT Ecosystem
author: Leeor Shimron
description: The sudden collapse of FTX crashed crypto prices. NFT markets are also feeling the pain.

title: Crypto Lawyer Roche Beset On 2 Fronts After Leaked Videos
author: Rosemarie Miller
description: Ava Labs, former client, minimizes relationship; Norwegian investor says he was ‘shocked.’

title: YouTube Competitor Uses New Blockchain To Connect Investors With African Musicians
author: Rufas Kamau
description: Ayoken is an NFT marketplace designed to empower musicians and other creatives monetize their work directly to their fans while giving them exclusive perks and digital collectibles.

title: State Of Crypto And Web3: Has The Space Gone In Winter Sleep Mode?
author: Philipp Sandner
description: The question is whether we are in the midst of a crypto winter or even a crypto ice age. In this article, we highlight the current trends in the crypto space and explain what the "crypto winter" is all about.

title: What Are The 3 Different Types Of Cryptocurrencies?
author: Javier Bastardo
description: Bitcoin originated a new technological wave. Let's explore what has happened and what different cryptocurrencies are.

title: Gary Gensler’s Crypto Crusade Gets A Major Assist From The NYDFS
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: New York’s financial regulator suddenly shuttered a $16 billion digital dollar that is reportedly on the SEC’s radar. It may have also helped them solve their own problem with the token.

title: Blockchain Data Is The Next Big Thing In Web3, According To This Expert
author: Oluwaseun Adeyanju
description: Blockchain data is currently is enormous and siloed, creating an access efficiency problem. On-chain data providers are necessary to make data across multiple chains accessible.

title: Shopify Buys Into Web3 Future Helping Back $24 Million Thirdweb Funding Round
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: Developer of web tools also counts Mark Cuban, Polygon, Coinbase

title: In Bear Crypto Markets, All Roads Lead To Bitcoin
author: Lawrence Wintermeyer
description: Bitcoin might be the world’s strongest decentralized network, but is it the best candidate for hosting DeFi? Bear markets were made for building and all eyes are on The Merge. When the market rallies again, we’ll know whether DeFi and Bitcoin have a shared future or are destined to remain estranged.

title: Beyond Crypto Custody: Fireblocks Unveils Web3 Engine To Support DeFi, Games And NFTs
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Blockchain infrastructure provider Fireblocks has launched a suite of developer tools and a portal for customers to access cryptocurrency exchanges, NFT marketplaces and other decentralized applications across multiple networks.

title: Peak Irrationality? A New Clone Of The Failed TerraUSD Stablecoin Has Surpassed $550 Million In Market Cap
author: Omkar Godbole
description: Despite the humility expressed by certain crypto investors following the dramatic $60 billion UST/LUNA collapse, a carbon copy headed up by a controversial figure is rapidly growing.

title: $100 Billion Crypto Price Boom Sees These Coins Leave Bitcoin And Ethereum In The Dust
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Bitcoin's and ethereum's gains pale in comparison to the rallies seen by some smaller cryptocurrencies this week...

title: ‘Fully Integrate Into Financial System’—Bitcoin And Crypto Now Braced For A Massive Earthquake That Could Hit The Price Of Ethereum, BNB, Solana, Cardano, XRP, Tron And Avalanche
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Bitcoin-supporting senator Cynthia Lummis (R-WY) has said she's finally ready to unveil the details of a long-awaited crypto bill—a proposal she claims will "fully integrate digital assets into our financial system"...

title: Developers Are Still Flocking To Crypto Amid Its Brutal Winter
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: Despite a rash of bankruptcies, hacks and dismal year for crypto prices, full-time open-source crypto developers reached an all-time high of 23,000 according to Electric Capital.

title: Ethereum, “The Merge”: What Developers Are Saying
author: Kenneth Rapoza
description: The new Ethereum is supposed to be faster, but not much cheaper anytime soon. That should keep the alternatives in business for longer.

title: Ethereum’s ‘Merge’ Still A Dud For Investors
author: Kenneth Rapoza
description: Ethereum's switch to proof of stake makes life cheaper for developers. Retail investors bailed. Big investors held. They'll eventually be rewarded, some say.

title: Ether Price Slips Post-Merge Alongside Solana, Cardano, And Algorand While Ethereum Classic Rises
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: After a brief surge, ether is down following a major technological upgrade.

title: Ethereum’s Major Upgrade Creates Big Questions, Complications For NFTs
author: Leeor Shimron
description: NFT holder may receive duplicates that are not only less valuable, but also dilute the worth of the original assets. Purchasers must also now be on the lookout for fraudulent tokens.

title: Web3 Summit At MIT Shows Tech’s Enthusiasm For Crypto Is Unabated Despite Crypto Bear
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: As bitcoin dips below $20,000 for the second time this month, unbridled enthusiasm is on display at MIT for Web3, blockchain and the metaverse.

title: ‘No Price Target’—Major Bitcoin Investor Issues Huge Crypto Prediction As Ethereum, BNB, XRP, Solana, Cardano, Dogecoin, Avalanche And Polkadot Swing
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Michael Saylor has predicted the bitcoin price will eventually go "into the millions"—calling regulation that's now expected as a result of the recent stablecoin terraUSD (UST) wipe out "good for the industry"...

title: Ethereum, Bitcoin Flippening: What Gives?
author: Clem Chambers
description: Flippening is the idea of an underdog overtaking a winner. Can Ethereum overtake Bitcoin in market cap?

title: Fed Fears Spark Sudden $100 Billion Crypto Price Crash—Sending Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, Solana, Cardano, XRP, Dogecoin, Polkadot, Tron And Avalanche Into Free Fall
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Bitcoin﻿﻿, ethereum and other major cryptocurrencies have crashed this weekend, with more than $100 billion wiped from the combined crypto market...

title: Crypto Now Primed For A Fed Earthquake After Huge $1 Trillion Price Crash Tanked Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, Solana, Cardano, XRP, Tron And Avalanche
author: Billy Bambrough
description: One closely-watched crypto analyst has predicted bitcoin will be "one of the best assets on the planet" once risk assets begin to recover and the Fed turns dovish...

title: ‘Peak Panic’—Crypto Market Teeters After Huge Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, XRP, Solana, Cardano, Dogecoin, Avalanche And Polkadot Price Crash
author: Billy Bambrough
description: As bitcoin and crypto traders come to terms with the huge price crash that's wiped $1 trillion from the combined crypto market since April, fears are mounting that more pain could be on the way if stock market contagion spreads...

title: Crypto Crackdowns Will Continue, But Innovation Can Survive
author: Sean Stein Smith
description: What crypto developers should focus on during this current crackdown

title: Does The Newest Project By 3ACs Founders Prove That Crypto Is Just Turtles All The Way Down?
author: William Anderson
description: This new project, a soon-to-launch cryptocurrency exchange site, is targeted at investors who have lost money or have money tied up in frozen or defunct crypto currency exchange platforms.

title: Bitcoin Can’t Escape The Bearish Global Market Problems
author: Clem Chambers
description: Everything is currently hugely bearish. The only things that might go up are all the currencies that are not the dollar.

title: Is The Crypto Collapse Permanent Or Merely A Crypto Winter?
author: Q.ai - Powering a Personal Wealth Movement
description: With mixed opinions on cryptocurrency, it may be tough to understand the investment landscape.

title: How Off-The-Wall Ideas Resulted In The Metaverse: Lessons For Web3
author: Elie Ohayon
description: From past experiences, including the dot-com bubble, we can draw lessons for the deluge of Web3 proclamations today.

title: Bitcoin Rallies 20% While Ethereum Rallies 80% From June Lows: Are We Out Of The Woods?
author: Rufas Kamau
description: Bitcoin has risen above $23,000 since its June low and traders are beginning to believe that the bear market is over.

title: DeFi Distress: As Another Shaky Stablecoin Breaks The Buck, Institutions Begin Shunning The Sector
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: USDD, a stablecoin carbon-copy of Terra fell 10% today and is now struggling to maintain its one dollar value. Institutions are fleeing other stablecoins and Defi could be in trouble.

title: The ‘Ultimate’ Bottom?—Major Fund Manager Reveals Shock Bitcoin Price Prediction And Stark Crypto Warning As Ethereum, BNB, XRP, Solana, Cardano And Avalanche Plummet
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Scott Minerd, the chief investment officer at $252 billion asset manager Guggenheim, has revealed just how far he thinks bitcoin could fall before it hits an "ultimate bottom"...

title: Ethereum, Solana, Avalanche, DeFi Tokens Fall - Bitcoin Holds Key Support Ahead Of Options Expiry
author: Omkar Godbole
description: Ethereum and its competitors dropped Thursday as investors continued to shed perceived risker digital assets. Bitcoin is holding stay above a key support level.

title: LUNA/UST’s Collapse Was As Damaging For Crypto As Mt. Gox, Says Prominent Blockchain Founder
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Avalanche founder Emin Gun Sirer, who diagnosed the fatal flaw in Ethereum's infamous DAO hack, said that this month's collapse was even bigger. He feels that it reaches the level of Mt. Gox and expects that this valuable lesson will open the door to regulators looking to rein in the industry.
